themes: Need for stability in cultural funding
High property taxes as a burden for creatives
Perceived inequity in tax policy (Tesla vs. creatives)
key_phrases: I don't know if grants are the right answer
not taking or refunding these people's massive property taxes
If it's okay to give Tesla tax breaks it should be okay to give the creative soul of Austin a tax break
solutions_proposed: not taking or refunding property taxes for creatives
providing tax breaks to the creative community
